Reviews.Title: “no refunds”
Reviews.Author: valentinvir
Reviews.Content: we rent for five days, we have to return back home sooner, we told the front desp pesrson she they can't give a ny refund, this is the first time this happen to me, and I travel a lot.

Reviews.Title: “Do NOT try your luck with this place!”
Reviews.Author: N_Valkyrie
Reviews.Content: This "Inn" will not be a pleasant experience for a wealth of reasons. Immediately, they will overtly try to overcharge you. In addition, the woman at the counter during the evening shift was unpleasant, and her service was horrendous to say the least. She had absolutely no shame in renting a room with horribly stained walls, a lack of toiletries and supplies (literally, one extremely thin toilet tissue roll, one sliver of soap, and two threadbare bath towels), and all the room doors on the front side of this "Inn" looked as though they have been kicked in regularly! A horrible and possibly dangerous place. When and if there are better rooms available, why would an "Innkeeper" choose to rent these rooms to anyone? Which begs another question, why would anyone want to stay at this facility now that they have learned this? If you want to be near attractions, do not stay here. You will not be close to the theme parks. This property is located at the opposite end of the city NEXT to where the attractions are located. Kissimmee is full of great deals for hotels. Keep looking. As a local who knows the area, do not stay here, or on this end of Kissimmee at all.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay in Kissimmee”
Reviews.Author: RPicard
Reviews.Content: We have stayed there more than 5 separate times in the past 20 years. Service is always great and courteous. The owners are extremely helpful with tips, suggestions and driving directions as well as discount tickets to attractions. The Flamingo Inn is a clean and quiet place to stay, and it is within easy walking distance from a convenience store/gas station, a major pharmacy as well as many other shops. Eventhough it is not a recent construction, the grounds and the building are always well maintained and clean. Also, we love the smaller size pool that is great for all ages and swimming abilities. Next time we visit Kissimmee - we will certainly stay at the Flaming Inn.

Reviews.Title: “Not to bad”
Reviews.Author: Roshellej09
Reviews.Content: This place is not all that bad.i stayed here about a handful of times.the service can be a little better

Reviews.Title: “Sleepless in Kissimmee”
Reviews.Author: Koala8009
Reviews.Content: Our room faced a bar across the street that started playig live music about the time we wanted to relax from a full day at Disney. It kept us awake till about 2:00 - 3:00 AM. The party continued at our hotel. It was 3:30 AM when we begged the people next door to us to please be quiet. By the way, there was no management after 11:00PM to help us. We had to endure 2 nights of this. Didn't have much of an option, because we prepaid with cash, and there were no rooms available elsewhere. Don't care about the cheap rate. It was no value!

Reviews.Title: “eww”
Reviews.Author: lilbit22
Reviews.Content: room smelled like smoke, and this guy kept following me. i had to leave i was so terrified. The rooms look like something out of a horror movie. Tiles in bathroom were so cracked i. The mattress was so stained and nasty. Definetly dont stay here

Reviews.Title: “place is not bad”
Reviews.Author: sgfromfl
Reviews.Content: we have been here two weeks. we are looking for a house here in kissimmee.These people are very nice and helpful.No its not the ritz but you are nto paying for the ritz.very good for the money.the place is clean.i smoke and old they gave me a groung with wifi at no charge. Like I said worth the cheap price.To all that think you are better than others , pay more and stay someplace else.

Reviews.Title: “Stay Away!”
Reviews.Author: dee66044
Reviews.Content: I made my own reservations two months in advance for this motel- I stayed there before two years ago. http://www.flamingoinn.com There web site picture is no longer accureate. They have a sign out front with a low nightly and weekly rate and it has attracted homeless people who now live at this hotel. I have nothing against homeless men but when they keep me up half the night and they stand on the balcony drinking, smoking and looking at my teenage daughter i get a bit upset. I made reservations and asked for a non smoking room for me and one for my friends family, they gave me a smoking room that smelled so bad i couldnt sleep. My friends room was not ready so they told her it would be ready in 10 minutes, after they lady came back down stairs she says there is a man in there who is not checking out, so they give her some small room with a bad smell, snot /mucus on the walls that was never cleaned up and there was only top bed covers, no under blankets on the bed. Nothing matched. For the price we didnt expect much but it was so unbarable that we told him we wanted to leave and he told us he would charge us one nights stay just to cancel, we didnt want to pay the extra fee since he messed up our rooms and reservations but he wouldnt back down, so we paid the fee and we left and found an econo-lodge down the street that was 10 times better. I did complain about the men standing outside all night and the lady said "they have been here for a month, they are good people". I will never stay here again, not even if it were free!

HotelInfo.Name: Flamingo Inn
HotelInfo.Address: 801 E. Vine St., Kissimmee, FL 34744
